eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu

Class WauzMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.WauzMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomItem, WauzInventory

    public class WauzMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements WauzInventory, CustomItem
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics. The main menu of the game, that will by default show all sub menus of the MMORPG mode.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzModeMenu

      • open

        public static void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Opens the menu for the given player. If it is opened in the hub, it will be redirected to the mode selection. Else all sub menus of the MMORPG mode plus a short information is shown. This includes the ability, collection and social menus.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should view the inventory.
        See Also:
        WauzModeMenu.open(Player), SocialMenuParts.addMenuParts(Player, Inventory, int), CollectionMenuParts.addMenuParts(Player, Inventory, int), AbilityMenuParts.addMenuParts(Player, Inventory, int), MenuUtils.setBorders(Inventory)

      • selectMenuPoint

        public void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click. The default event will be automatically canceled. If a sub menu was clicked, it will be opened.
        Specified by:
        selectMenuPoint in interface WauzInventory
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.
        See Also:
        SocialMenuParts.check(Player, ItemStack), CollectionMenuParts.check(Player, ItemStack), AbilityMenuParts.check(Player, ItemStack)
